# 2022-01-18
```{r}
require(tidyverse)
# tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2022-01-18')
# chocolate <- tuesdata$chocolate
# chocolate %>% write_csv('data/chocolate.csv')
chocolate <- read_csv('data/chocolate.csv',
                      col_types = cols(.default=col_character(),
                                       ref=col_number(),
                                       review_date=col_number(),
                                       rating=col_number()))
chocolate %>% head()
```

```{r}
chocolate %>% 
  separate(ingredients, into=c('n_ingredients', 'ingredients'),
           sep=1)
```


```{r}
chocolate %>% count(company_manufacturer, company_location)
```


```{r}
ggplot(chocolate, aes(review_date, rating, color=company_location)) +
  geom_point(alpha=.2) +
  facet_wrap(~company_manufacturer)
```
